channel.title: [Solved]Applying template changes to appVMs
channel.description: Installed a few things to the Fedora-23 TemplateVM via terminal and created a new appVM using this template, but when I try to run these on the new VM they do not seem to be there. EDIT: NVM I'm dumb forgot to restart Template.
